bookTitle: Ender's Game: Ender In Exile (Marvel Premiere Editions)
Plot: Collects Ender's Game: Ender in Exile #1-5. The direct sequel to Ender's Game! Thirteen year-old Ender Wiggin has saved mankind from an alien threat. His reward? Exile. Branded a monster by those who feel threatened by his military genius, Ender is suddenly a hero without a home.
